entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of freezing rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of freezing rain. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of drizzle. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to periods of drizzle and ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches developing early in the morning and dissipating in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late in the evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
